thread.title: Meryl Streep Singing Is Everyone's New Favorite Meme
thread.title_full: Meryl Streep Singing Is Everyone's New Favorite Meme

title: Meryl Streep Singing Is Everyone's New Favorite Meme
text: Meryl Streep Singing Is Everyone's New Favorite Meme Most Popular By Estelle Tang Mar 20, 2017 Pretty much everything Meryl Streep does is amazing. She's a formidable actress, an outspoken advocate for the causes she believes in, and just seems like the most fun ever. GIF Giphy Advertisement   That's probably why our new favorite meme features the legendary actress. A screenshot of Streep showing her support for awardee Debbie Reynolds at the 2015 SAG Awards has gone viral after Twitter users started captioning it with song lyrics. From Beyoncé to Britney to your favorite #tbt hit, meme Meryl has been joining in on every song, just like your most reliable karaoke buddy: Alicia Keys: IN NEW Y RKMe: CONCRETE JUNGLE WET DREAM TOM TO pic.twitter.com/9VM4tXytHs
